application.doc: Retrieving the status of the clustered runtime profiles

method.name: GET
method.doc: This service is used to retrieve the status of the clustered runtimes.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

representation.name: RuntimeProfileClusterStatusResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: id
param.doc: The IP address or hostname of the clustered node.

param.name: master
param.doc: Indicates if this cluster node is the primary master node.

param.name: running
param.doc: Indicates whether or not this node is running.

param.name: restart
param.doc: Indicates if any changes to the configuration been made that require the server to be restarted.

param.name: reload
param.doc: Indicates if any changes to the configuration been made that require the server to be reloaded.
